item.title: Resume
item.description: Dat Nguyen - Graphics Programmer Summary Ex-AI Engineer self-teaching my way into becoming a graphics programmer. Technical Skills C++, Vulkan, OpenGL, Rendering techniques: Phong shading, Phong illumination, normal map, shadow map, Profiling and debugging with RenderDoc. Work Experience Freelance Python Developer, January 2023 - Present Vietnam Developed extensions for 3D Slicer to enable custom features. Developed medical image processing pipelines: registration, segmentation, color manipulation. Running TotalSegmentator on AWS EC2. Prompt Engineering projects.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Spinning Mug I’m creating a Vulkan renderer from scratch to learn graphic programming. Marching Cubes I implemented the marching cubes algorithm and used it to visualize 3d segmentation of medical images.
